name: Lox Catches the Coins
description:
Lox Catches the Coins 

"HOW MANY COINS CAN YOU COLLECT?"

Xbox Magazine November 2006

Play on Scratch or Newgrounds!

Newgrounds Version:

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/855411

Scratch Version:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/736318833

Lox Catches the Coins is the Game where you play as Lox the Cat on his floating block as he Catches the Coins from the Sky but Expect the Bombs.

Controls:

A, D and Arrow Keys - Move

Test your Coin Catching Skills in this Never Ending Game!

Credits:

AdrielNG342- Coding, Art, Animation

SEGA Sound Team- Composer of Extra Life Sound and Game over Sound

The Scratch Team- Sound Effects

Special Thanks:

S-zenmode, DylanTheLegendz, DevelopDum, the Scratch Team, GarboMuffin, Mindchamber, Stepford, Tom Fulp and Anyone Else I forgot.

Made with Scratch 3.0 and Complied using TurboWarp

Presented by: AdrielNG342
